siteInfo.name: Mark Repair Services
siteInfo.tagline: Reliable Home Repair, Renovation & Maintenance Services
siteInfo.description: Professional home repair, renovation, and maintenance solutions. Quick fixes to full upgrades, our experienced team is ready to help.

hero.headline: Your Home Deserves
hero.subheadline: Looking for Trusted Home Repair Services?
hero.description: Mark Repair Services provides professional home repair, renovation, and maintenance solutions. Whether you're looking for a quick fix or a complete home transformation, our experienced team delivers quality workmanship with transparent pricing.

about.headline: Why Choose Mark Repair Services?
about.subheadline: Your Trusted Partner for Home Care Since 2010
about.description: For over 15 years, Mark Repair Services has been the trusted choice for homeowners seeking reliable, professional home repair and maintenance solutions. We combine old-fashioned craftsmanship with modern techniques to deliver results that exceed expectations.
about.mission: Our mission is to make home repairs simple and stress-free. We believe every homeowner deserves access to honest, skilled professionals who treat your home with the same care they'd give their own.
about.vision: To be the most trusted name in home services, known for integrity, quality, and customer-first service in every community we serve.

values.title: Quality Craftsmanship
values.description: Every job is completed to the highest standards. We don't cut corners because your home deserves the best.

values.title: Transparent Pricing
values.description: No hidden fees, no surprises. You'll know exactly what to expect before work begins.

values.title: Customer First
values.description: Your satisfaction drives everything we do. We listen, communicate, and deliver on our promises.

values.title: Reliability
values.description: When we say we'll be there, we're there. On time, every time, with the right tools and skills.

values.title: Safety Priority
values.description: All work meets or exceeds safety codes. Your family's wellbeing is our top concern.

values.title: Eco-Conscious
values.description: We use environmentally friendly products and sustainable practices whenever possible.

howItWorks.headline: How It Works
howItWorks.description: We've streamlined our process to make home repairs as easy as possible. From first contact to job completion, here's what to expect.

steps.title: Tell Us What You Need
steps.description: Describe your repair or project needs through our online form, phone, or chat. The more details, the better we can help.

steps.title: Share Property Details
steps.description: Let us know the area of your home that needs attention and any specific requirements or preferences.

steps.title: Get Your Free Estimate
steps.description: We'll provide a clear, detailed estimate with no hidden fees. Ask questions—we're happy to explain everything.

steps.title: We Complete the Job
steps.description: Our professionals arrive on time, complete the work to your satisfaction, and leave your space clean.

emergency.headline: 24/7 Emergency Services
emergency.description: Some problems can't wait until morning. Our emergency response team is available around the clock for urgent plumbing, electrical, and repair issues that threaten your home or family's safety.

services.title: Emergency Plumbing
services.description: Burst pipes, major leaks, sewage backups, and water heater failures need immediate attention.

services.title: Emergency Electrical
services.description: Power outages, sparking outlets, burning smells, and exposed wiring require urgent professional help.

services.title: Same-Day Repairs
services.description: For urgent but non-emergency issues, we offer same-day service to prevent further damage.

cta.headline: Ready to Transform Your Home?
cta.description: Get started today with a free, no-obligation estimate. Our team is ready to tackle your home repair and renovation needs.

contact.headline: Get in Touch
contact.description: Have questions or ready to schedule service? Reach out through any of the channels below. We typically respond within 2 hours during business hours.

footer.description: Mark Repair Services is committed to providing dependable home repair and maintenance solutions. We focus on honest communication, quality work, and customer satisfaction.
